column2: A homebase for the bees consists of its famous hexagon shapes.
column3: Many are dutied with guarding its most precious produces; which poses such allure.

column2: A perfect stronghold for the hens to shelter them from harm and abnormal weather.
column3: Sometimes; you feel you are fighting a holy war with the hens; despite the nobleness of your mission.

column2: A simple and strategic setup to catch fish and other marine animals made with quality nets and wood sticks.
column3: Sometimes you might be surprised by what is actually trapped in there—we hope it’s something marvellous!

column2: Partially flooded with water; the paddy is used to cultivate rice crops.
column3: It’s a miracle these plants survive in water; others can’t bear that much moisture.
